get.summary: Get list of components for a resource.

200.description: OK. At least one component found.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

nextLink.description: URL for next set of results.

MonitorProperties.description: Model for properties of a Monitor.

monitorDisplayName.description: User friendly display name of the monitor

parentMonitorDisplayName.description: User friendly display name of the parent monitor

componentTypeDisplayName.description: Component Type Display Name of the monitor

monitorState.description: Is the monitor state enabled or disabled

criteria.description: Collection of MonitorCriteria. For PATCH calls, instead of partial list, complete list of expected criteria should be passed for proper updating.

frequency.description: Frequency at which monitor condition is evaluated

lookbackDuration.description: The duration in minutes in the past during which the monitor is evaluated

documentationURL.description: URL pointing to the documentation of the monitor

signalName.description: Name of the signal on which this monitor is configured.

signalType.description: Type of the signal on which this monitor is configured.

healthState.description: Target health state of the criteria

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison enum on threshold of this criteria

nextLink.description: URL to the next set of results.

ComponentProperties.description: Model for properties of a component.

solutionId.description: ID of the OMS solution this component belong to.

componentTypeName.description: Name of the component type. Qualifies the type of component such as whether it is a SQL database, logical disk, website, etc.

componentTypeGroupCategory.description: Component type group category. Classification of component type groups into a logical category. e.g. Network, Disk, Memory, CPU.

healthStateChangesStartTime.description: Start time for health state changes.

healthStateChangesEndTime.description: End time for health state changes.

lastHealthStateChangeTime.description: Time of last health state change.

vmId.description: ID of the VM this component belongs to.

vmName.description: Name of the VM this component belongs to.

vmTags.description: Tags on the VM this component belongs to.

MonitorInstancesCollection.description: Model for collection of health instances.

nextLink.description: URL to the next set of results.

MonitorInstanceProperties.description: Model for properties of a monitor instance.

solutionId.description: ID of the OMS solution this health instance belong to.

componentTypeName.description: Name of the component type. Qualifies the type of component such as whether it is a SQL database, logical disk, website, etc.

monitorType.description: Type of the monitor. The qualifier for the health criteria depending on the functionality it performs such as Unit, Aggregate, Dependency.

monitorCategory.description: Monitor type category. Indicates the attribute of the component that the health criteria monitors such as Performance, Availability, etc.

healthStateCategory.description: Category of monitor instance's health state.

healthStateChangesStartTime.description: Start time for health state changes.

healthStateChangesEndTime.description: End time for health state changes.

lastHealthStateChangeTime.description: Time of last health state change.

healthStateChangeTime.description: Time at which this Health state was reached.

nextLink.description: URL to the next set of results.

NotificationSettingProperties.description: Model for properties of a NotificationSetting.

actionGroupResourceIds.description: List of action group resource ids to be notified

OperationListResult.description: Container for a list of operations supported by the resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to the next set of results.

Operation.description: Operation supported by the resource provider.

display.description: The properties of the resource operation.

name.description: The name of the resource operation.

OperationProperties.description: Properties of an operation supported by the resource provider.

description.description: The description of the resource provider.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

AzureEntityResource.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: The API version to use for this operation.

$select.name: $select
$select.description: Properties to be returned in the response.

$filter.name: $filter
$filter.description: Filter to be applied on the operation.

$orderby.name: $orderby
$orderby.description: Sort the result on one or more properties.

$expand.name: $expand
$expand.description: Include properties inline in the response.

$top.name: $top
$top.description: Limit the result to the specified number of rows.

$skiptoken.name: $skiptoken
$skiptoken.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API.

notificationSettingName.name: notificationSettingName
notificationSettingName.description: Default string modeled as parameter for URL to work correctly.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
